column7: Individual study in a subject related to information sciences not covered in normal course offerings. Approved for Letter and S/U grading. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 6 hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor. Submission of "Request to Enroll in IS Independent Study".
